name: Diesel - Grind - Torpedo
additionalNotes: A powerful yet smooth smoke with deep notes of leather, pepper, earth, and cedar. This Nicaraguan puro features a savory, dark Habano wrapper and it is filled with premium tobacco leaves. Handmade in Esteli, Nicaragua by AJ Fernandez, the Diesel Grind Toro offers an intense smoking experience that is best enjoyed after a hearty meal.
